Room.Name: Charybdis Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Charybdis Way, which runs north and south.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection with Alturis Road is directly south. From here, you can see the famous Hanging Gardens which are built along Alturis Road. There is an entrance to the great medical research hospital run by the Holy Order of the White Rose. The entrance is on the west side of the street.
